quote_first: Cell count down to 400,000. Woke 8:10. To sleep
quote_last: . (Appear to have lost my watch without realising it, had to drive into town to buy another.)
title: The Voices of Time
author: JG Ballard

quote_first: Nick had a large wild plan of his own for the night, but for now he let Leo take charge: they were going to go back to Notting Hill and catch the
quote_last: screening of Scarface at the Gate.
title: The Line of Beauty
author: Alan Hollinghurst

quote_first: The party was to begin at seven. The invitations gave the hour as six-thirty because the famly knew everyone would come a little late, so as not to be the first to arrive. .. By
quote_last: not another soul could squeeze into the house.
title: The elderly lady
author: Jorge Luis Borges
